title: Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei Specials

synonyms: Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Kanketsu Ban: Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei
World Masterpiece Theater Complete Edition: Little Women II - Jo's Boys
alternative_titles.ja: 世界名作劇場・完結版 若草物語 ナンとジョー先生

synopsis:
A summary of the Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei full series aired as a TV specials.

Nan Harding is the new student at Mr. and Mrs. Bhaer's school. Everyone thinks that she is a pain in the head, but not Mrs. Jo. Together with the other kids, they all embark on their personal adventures and misfortunes while learning in school.

(Source: ANN)
